QueryDefinition.Query:
SELECT CAST(RIGHT(Member_ID, LEN(Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS person_id, date_of_health_checkup AS observation_date, --value_as_number BMI, ast as Got, abdominal_circumference as Abdominal_girth, systolic_bp as SBP, diastolic_bp as DBP, total_cholesterol as TC, Triglyceride as TG, alt as gpt,
CASE WHEN uric_protein_qualitative is NULL THEN NULL WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 1 THEN '-' WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 2 THEN '-+' WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 3 THEN '+' WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 4 THEN '++' WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 5 THEN '+++' END AS Urine_protein,
CASE WHEN uric_protein_qualitative is NULL THEN NULL WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 1 THEN 'Absent' WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 2 THEN 'Equivocal' WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 3 THEN '+' WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 4 THEN '++' WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 5 THEN '+++' END AS Urine_protein_unit,
CASE WHEN uric_protein_qualitative is NULL THEN NULL WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 1 THEN 4132135 WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 2 THEN 4172976 WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 3 THEN 4123508 WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 4 THEN 4126673 WHEN uric_protein_qualitative = 5 THEN 4125547 END AS Urine_protein_unit_concept_id,
hdl_cholesterol as HDL_C, ldl_cholesterol as LDL_C,
G_GT as G_GT, Fasting_blood_sugar as Fasting_blood_sugar, Casual_blood_sugar as Casual_blood_sugar, HbA1c, HCT as Hematocrit, hemoglobin_content as Hemoglobin, rbc_count as Red_blood_cell_count, Serum_uric_acid as Serum_uric_acid, Serum_creatinine as Serum_creatinine,
--value_as_string CASE WHEN Urinary_sugar is NULL THEN NULL WHEN Urinary_sugar = 1 THEN '-' WHEN Urinary_sugar = 2 THEN '-+' WHEN Urinary_sugar = 3 THEN '+' WHEN Urinary_sugar = 4 THEN '++' WHEN Urinary_sugar = 5 THEN '+++' END AS Urine_sugar,
CASE WHEN Urinary_sugar is NULL THEN NULL WHEN Urinary_sugar = 1 THEN 'Absent' WHEN Urinary_sugar = 2 THEN 'Equivocal' WHEN Urinary_sugar = 3 THEN '+' WHEN Urinary_sugar = 4 THEN '++' WHEN Urinary_sugar = 5 THEN '+++' END AS Urine_sugar_unit,
CASE WHEN Urinary_sugar is NULL THEN NULL WHEN Urinary_sugar = 1 THEN 4132135 WHEN Urinary_sugar = 2 THEN 4172976 WHEN Urinary_sugar = 3 THEN 4123508 WHEN Urinary_sugar = 4 THEN 4126673 WHEN Urinary_sugar = 5 THEN 4125547 END AS Urine_sugar_unit_concept_id,
CASE WHEN Fundus_examination_Keith_Wagener_classification IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN Fundus_examination_Keith_Wagener_classification = 1 THEN '0' WHEN Fundus_examination_Keith_Wagener_classification = 2 THEN 'I' WHEN Fundus_examination_Keith_Wagener_classification = 3 THEN 'IIa' WHEN Fundus_examination_Keith_Wagener_classification = 4 THEN 'IIb' WHEN Fundus_examination_Keith_Wagener_classification = 5 THEN 'III' ELSE 'IV' END AS Ophthalmoscopy_K_W_classificatio,
CASE WHEN fundus_examination_scheie_classification_h IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN fundus_examination_scheie_classification_h = 1 THEN '0' WHEN fundus_examination_scheie_classification_h = 2 THEN '1' WHEN fundus_examination_scheie_classification_h = 3 THEN '2' WHEN fundus_examination_scheie_classification_h = 3 THEN '3' ELSE '4' END AS Ophthalmoscopy_Scheie_Classifica,
CASE WHEN fundus_examination_scheie_classification_s IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN fundus_examination_scheie_classification_s = 1 THEN '0' WHEN fundus_examination_scheie_classification_s = 2 THEN '1' WHEN fundus_examination_scheie_classification_s = 3 THEN '2' WHEN fundus_examination_scheie_classification_s = 3 THEN '3' ELSE '4' END AS Ophthalmoscopy_Scheie_Classific0,
CASE WHEN fundus_examination_scott_classification IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN fundus_examination_scott_classification = 1 THEN 'I (a)' WHEN fundus_examination_scott_classification = 2 THEN 'I (b)' WHEN fundus_examination_scott_classification = 3 THEN 'II' WHEN fundus_examination_scott_classification = 4 THEN 'III (a)' WHEN fundus_examination_scott_classification = 5 THEN 'III (b)' WHEN fundus_examination_scott_classification = 6 THEN 'IV' WHEN fundus_examination_scott_classification = 7 THEN 'V (a)' WHEN fundus_examination_scott_classification = 8 THEN 'V (b)' ELSE 'VI' END AS Ophthalmoscopy_SCOTT_classificat,
CASE WHEN Eating1_fast_eating IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN Eating1_fast_eating = 1 THEN 'fast' WHEN Eating1_fast_eating = 2 THEN 'average' WHEN Eating1_fast_eating = 3 THEN 'slow' ELSE cast(Eating1_fast_eating as varchar(1)) || ' unknown' END AS Eating_speed,
CASE WHEN Eating2_before_bedtime IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN Eating2_before_bedtime = 1 THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END AS Eating_before_bedtime,
CASE WHEN Eating2_before_bedtime IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN Eating2_before_bedtime = 1 THEN 4188539 ELSE 4188540 END AS Eating_before_bedtime_concept_id,
CASE WHEN eating3_snack IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN eating3_snack = 1 THEN 'Every day' WHEN eating3_snack = 2 THEN 'Sometimes' WHEN eating3_snack = 3 THEN 'Rarely' END AS Eat_snack,
CASE WHEN eating3_snack IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN eating3_snack = 1 THEN 4288153 WHEN eating3_snack = 2 THEN 765707 WHEN eating3_snack = 3 THEN 763696 END AS Eat_snack_concept_id,
CASE WHEN Eating3_late_evening_snack IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN Eating3_late_evening_snack = 1 THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END AS night_meal,
CASE WHEN Eating3_late_evening_snack IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN Eating3_late_evening_snack = 1 THEN 4188539 ELSE 4188540 END AS night_meal_concept_id,
CASE WHEN eating_habit_breakfast IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN eating_habit_breakfast = 1 THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END AS Skip_breakfast,
CASE WHEN eating_habit_breakfast IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN eating_habit_breakfast = 1 THEN 4188539 ELSE 4188540 END AS Skip_breakfast_concept_id,
CASE WHEN drinking_habit_until_mar_24 IS NULL and drinking_habit_after_apr_24 IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 1 THEN 'Daily' WHEN drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 2 THEN '5~6 days a week' WHEN drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 3 THEN '3~4 days a week' WHEN drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 4 THEN '1~2 days a week' WHEN drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 5 THEN '1~3 days per month' WHEN drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 6 THEN 'Less than 1 day per month' WHEN drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 7 THEN 'Quit' WHEN drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 8 THEN 'Dont drink (cant drink)'
WHEN drinking_habit_until_mar_24 = 1 THEN 'Every day' WHEN drinking_habit_until_mar_24 = 2 THEN 'Sometimes' ELSE 'Rarely' END AS Drinking_habits,
CASE WHEN drinking_habit_until_mar_24 IS NULL and drinking_habit_after_apr_24 IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN drinking_habit_until_mar_24 = 1 or drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 1 THEN 4288153 WHEN drinking_habit_until_mar_24 = 2 and drinking_habit_after_apr_24 is null THEN 765707 WHEN drinking_habit_until_mar_24 = 3 and drinking_habit_after_apr_24 is null THEN 763696 WHEN drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 7 THEN 4220362 WHEN drinking_habit_after_apr_24 = 8 THEN 4022664 ELSE 0 END AS Drinking_habits_concept_id,
CASE WHEN amount_of_drinking_until_mar_24 IS NULL and amount_of_drinking_after_apr_24 IS NULL THEN NULL
WHEN amount_of_drinking_after_apr_24 = 1 THEN '1 is not in the balance' WHEN amount_of_drinking_after_apr_24 = 2 THEN '1~2 is not in the balance' WHEN amount_of_drinking_after_apr_24 = 3 THEN '2~3 is not in the balance' WHEN amount_of_drinking_after_apr_24 = 4 THEN '3~5' WHEN amount_of_drinking_after_apr_24 = 5 THEN '5 or more'
WHEN amount_of_drinking_until_mar_24 = 1 THEN 'Less than 1' WHEN amount_of_drinking_until_mar_24 = 2 THEN 'Less than 2' WHEN amount_of_drinking_until_mar_24 = 3 THEN 'Less than 3' WHEN amount_of_drinking_until_mar_24 = 4 THEN '3 or more' END AS amount_of_drinking,
ecg as Electrocardiogram,
CASE WHEN ecg IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS Condition,
CASE WHEN ecg IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN ecg = 1 THEN 320536 ELSE 4065279 END AS ecg_concept_id,
CASE WHEN ecg IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN ecg = 1 THEN 'Electrocardiogram abnormal' ELSE 'ECG normal' END AS ecg_concept_name,
CASE WHEN smoking_habit_until_mar_24 IS NULL and smoking_habit_after_apr_24 IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN smoking_habit_until_mar_24 = 1 or smoking_habit_after_apr_24 = 1 THEN 4298794 WHEN smoking_habit_after_apr_24 = 2 THEN 4310250 ELSE 4222303 END AS Smoking_habit_concept_id,
CASE WHEN smoking_habit_until_mar_24 IS NULL and smoking_habit_after_apr_24 IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN smoking_habit_until_mar_24 = 1 or smoking_habit_after_apr_24 = 1 THEN 'Smoker' WHEN smoking_habit_after_apr_24 = 2 THEN 'Ex-smoker' ELSE 'Non-smoker' END AS Smoking_habit_concept_name,
CASE WHEN mastication IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN mastication = 1 THEN 45880745 WHEN mastication = 2 THEN 45877108 WHEN mastication = 3 THEN 45884578 ELSE 0 END AS mastication_value,
CASE WHEN sleep IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN sleep = 1 THEN 4188539 ELSE 4188540 END AS Sleeping_value, 40 as Abdominal_girth_min, 250 as Abdominal_girth_max, 60 as SBP_min, 300 as SBP_max, 30 as DBP_min, 150 as DBP_max, 30 as TC_min, 1500 as TC_max, 10 as TG_min, 2000 as TG_max, 10 as HDL_C_min, 500 as HDL_C_max, 20 as LDL_C_min, 1000 as LDL_C_max, 1000 as GPT_max, 1000 as G_GT_max, 20 as Fasting_blood_sugar_min, 600 as Fasting_blood_sugar_max, 50 as Casual_blood_sugar_min, 500 as Casual_blood_sugar_max, 3 as HbA1c_min, 20 as HbA1c_max, 1000 as Hematocrit_max, 30 as Hemoglobin_max, 1000 as Red_blood_cell_count_max, 100 as Serum_uric_acid_max, 100 as Serum_creatinine_max, ch.PartitionId FROM {sc}.Annual_health_checkup h JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND h.Member_ID = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by ch.PartitionId, CAST(RIGHT(Member_ID, LEN(Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT)

Field.defaultSource: Eat snack other than breakfast, lunch and dinner
Have a late-night meal after supper more than 3 times in a week
Eat snack after dinner more than 3 times in a week
Skip breakfast more than 3 times in a week
